mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICET ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_HIT, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'MM/DD') NOTICE_DATE, USER_NAME FROM NOTICET N, USERT U WHERE N.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_HIT, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'MM/DD') NOTICE_DATE, USER_NAME, NOTICE_IMG FROM NOTICET N, USERT U WHERE N.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICET SET NOTICE_HIT = NOTICE_HIT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
